name: Concepteur de publications Human-in-the-Loop avec Mistral AI, ImageKit et LinkedIn Publishing
description:
## üìã Description
Ce workflow n8n simplifie la cr√©ation de publications aliment√©es par l'IA avec des banni√®res d'images, inclut des √©tapes d'approbation manuelle et publie sur LinkedIn ‚Äî le tout de mani√®re dynamique.

Il utilise ImageKit.io pour √©diter des images, les stocke sur S3 et g√©n√®re et r√©vise des publications via un agent Mistral AI avec r√©vision humaine.

## üß† Comment √ßa fonctionne (niveau √©lev√©)
üîÑ D√©clench√© par un message de chat entrant

üß† L'IA r√©dige une publication et ajoute des instructions d'image

üñºÔ∏è L'API ImageKit ajoute un texte superpos√© √† l'image

‚òÅÔ∏è L'image est t√©l√©charg√©e sur S3 pour un usage public

üßë‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è √âtape d'approbation humaine par e-mail

üîÅ Boucle de r√©vision optionnelle

üì¢ Publie le contenu approuv√© sur LinkedIn

## üõ†Ô∏è Exigences de configuration

üîë Cl√© API pour ImageKit.io

üß† Mod√®le IA via Mistral (ou substitut comme OpenAI)

üì© Configuration de l'e-mail pour le n≈ìud d'approbation

‚òÅÔ∏è Acc√®s au bucket AWS S3

üîó Identifiants LinkedIn pour la publication

parameters.text:
=##role
you are assistant to make LinkedIn post based on user response
post :{{ $('AI Agent').item.json.output.postclean }}
changes :{{ $json.data['Content Feedback'] }}
Don't make drastic changes ‚Äî only needed edits for grammar, clarity, or flow.
Return the post back in the same tone and structure.

##input

options.systemMessage:
= You are a precise HTML formatter. Convert the following LinkedIn-style post written in Markdown into valid, semantic HTML suitable for sending as the body of a professional marketing email. Requirements: - Keep the structure and tone of a LinkedIn post (short paragraphs, emojis, clear headers, bullets, numbered lists, line breaks) - Use semantic HTML:

,
,

    ,
      ,
    1. , , ,
      , , etc. - Apply minimal inline CSS to enhance readability (font size, spacing, alignment) so it's visually polished when viewed in email - Do NOT include , , or tags - Do NOT use any JavaScript -all hastag in one lines dont use break - At the bottom, embed this image: - Output only raw HTML with no extra explanation or text or tags

##Role
You are an assistant with the role of data formatter and banner caption creator.

##Instructions
1. For any given user query or post, remove only formatting issues such as \n, **. The output should be clean, grammatically correct, and naturally readable. Important: don't remove emojis.
2. Based on the cleaned input, create a catchy, relevant, and impactful banner text.
   -If the banner text is 5 words or less, it will be a single line.
   -important If it's more than 5 words, it will be split into line1 and line2. Each line will contain a maximum of 5 words.
3. All banner text (single line or split lines) will be URL-encoded.
4. Respond ONLY with a JSON object.
5. only use %20 instead of space

Example Input:
"This is a **really** awesome new product launch! Get ready for innovation!\nüöÄ"

Example Output:
```json
{
  "postclean": "This is a really awesome new product launch!  ready innovation! ",
  "banner_text": {
    "line1": "Awesome%20New%20Product%20Launch", only 5 words allowed
    "line2":"Ready%20Innovation" should start with word
  }
}

parameters.content: clean post and add image banner
## image kit io for adding text on image https://imagekit.io/
s3 bucket for dynamic display of image
